content: materials purl soho s yonder 1 50% alpaca and 50% highland wool each skein is approximately 140 yards/ 100 grams - main color mc 3 9 skeins approximately 390 1260 total yards required - contrast color 1 cc1 2 5 skeins approximately 195 630 total yards required - contrast color 2 cc2 2 5 skeins approximately 195 630 total yards required you will also need… - us 10 6 mm 40-inch circular needles 2 note if you re making the throw size be sure to check your gauge and consider leaving the last skein of each cc unwound until you are sure you need it if you don t end up needing it you can return unwound yarn for a refund within 30 days of purchase or within 6 months for store credit our return policy 3 has all the details gauge 16 stitches and 32 row 16 ridges = 4 inches in garter stitch blocked sizes crib throw - finished dimensions of basic square blocked 14 x 14 inches 25½ x 25½ inches - finished dimensions of blanket blocked 28¼ x 28¼ inches 51 x 51 inches samples for more information about the colors used in these samples click here 4 designed for purl soho by ksenia naidyon 5 the talented designer behind life is cozy 6 where she shares patterns for her beautiful hand knits instructions for must-know stitch patterns and reviews on needles books and notions… everything we knitters love all images ©️ copyright purl soho 1 https //www purlsoho com/yonder html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/return-policy 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/2023/10/13/knitters-choice-striped-blanket/ 5 https //lifeiscozy com/patterns 6 https //lifeiscozy com/
